statements: SELECT username FROM security_table WHERE id = 2
SELECT password FROM security_table WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, COUNT(*) FROM security_table GROUP BY id
SELECT * FROM security_table ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM security_table ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM security_table WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM security_table WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM security_table WHERE password LIKE '%123%'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 1;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, permissions.permission_id, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_id, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_id, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_id, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.permission_id, p.permission_name FROM users u RIGHT JOIN permissions p ON u.user_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_name DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 100;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT username, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY username;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username NOT LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id > 50 AND id < 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM users);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = (SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = 1);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = ANY (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith');
SELECT id, username, password FROM users
SELECT users.id, users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id

SELECT users.id, users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT users.username, COUNT(user_roles.role_id) FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id GROUP BY users.username HAVING COUNT(user_roles.role_id) > 1
SELECT users.username, COUNT(users.username) FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id GROUP BY users.username HAVING COUNT(users.username) > 1
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_roles.role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id WHERE role_permissions.permission_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id;

SELECT users.user_id, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
